title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.1 - Approved entities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.1 - Approved entities

State Regulations

Courses of instruction may be given by any college or
university accredited by the Commissioner of Education of the State of New

York, any public and/or private vocational school, any bail enforcement
professional society or organization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
171.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
